item.title: Worksheet
item.description: Worksheet # Use the prompts from this worksheet to write about your own life while shielding, or to interview someone else about their story. Would you like to share your story at The Shielding (anonymously)? We’d love to hear from you! You can reach us at: theshielding@protonmail.com. Download worksheet as PDF (17 KB) Download worksheet as plain text (1 KB) Worksheet # Basics # When did you start shielding?

item.title: Take Part
item.description: Take Part # Are you, or have you been, shielding? Or maybe you know someone who shields? If so, we would love to hear from you! Anonymous stories are welcome. Get in touch: theshielding@protonmail.com. How does it work? # Once we’ve received your note: Together we’ll pick a time and format for a conversation (a.k.a. ‘interview’). This can be a (video) call, email, messages or chat—whatever you’re most comfortable with.

item.title: About
item.description: About # The Shielding is run by a small group of people with one thing in common: all of us have been shielding since early on in the current COVID-19 pandemic. We started The Shielding in March 2022 out of a sense of bafflement and urgency. Bafflement, because it seemed that the outside world had fallen largely into pandemic denialism. Even though in many regions, infections numbers are still intolerably high.
